short_summary: Anritsu S820E Site Master Handheld Antenna and Cable Analyzers
description: As a requirement of the Supply Arrangement, this notice is published on Buyandsell for a period of 15 calendar days.
tags: Handheld Antenna and Cable Analyzers OR EQUIVALENT
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### [Anritsu S820E Site Master Handheld Antenna and Cable Analyzers]
#### Title: Request for Proposals
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01031152

#### I. Overview
Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of Anritsu S820E Site Master Handheld Antenna and Cable Analyzers or equivalent products.

#### II. Requirements and Specifications
- Scope of Work: Supply of Anritsu S820E Site Master Handheld Antenna and Cable Analyzers or equivalent products
- Delivery Date: Within 12 weeks of the order date
- Location: Newfoundland and Labrador

#### III. Request for Proposals (RFP) Process
- Solicitation Number: 30003857
- Publication Date: March 30, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: April 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)
- Pre-qualification Process: Suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) to participate
- Tender Status: Expired

#### IV. Contractor Information
- Contractor Name: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
- Address: 200 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada
- Email: [Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- Phone: 343-542-9691

#### V. Appendices
- No additional appendices are attached to this tender announcement.

Note: I removed all UnSpsc fields since they seem to be empty. I focused on giving a proper overview of the announcement, tender specs, contractor information and that's it. 

The previous rewritten output was incomplete. The other requirements are too minor to mention.
